name: Metal Quest
description: Metal Quest is a 16 bit Party and class Based RPG game, semi-turn-based combat, set in a Unique world where metal music replaces magic, and traditional fantasy weapons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Intel速 Pentium速4 1.5GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
